creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
1. Fix SVG in alls examples
      [fop] ... svg graphic could not be built: file:.../examples/fo/basic/:-1
      [fop] The attribute "width" of the element <rect> is required
2. Remove unnecessary hyphenation advice in examples/fo/basic/link.fo
3. Warnings in examples\fo\basic\blockcontainer.fo and lots of "Line 1 of a
paragraph overflows the available area." in various files.

Item 1 is:
http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/faq.html#svg-attribute-required

Either you have to patch your JDK/JRE or we have to start working with
-Xbootclasspath
creator: jeremias@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
